Schenectady Public Schools
CC T-V Project
Office of the Coordinator
Mont Pleasant High School
SCHENECTADY, NEWYORK
May 7, 1956
The National Association of
Educational Broadcasters
Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Gentlemen:
Would you please send all the
necessary information concerning affiliate
and associate membership in your organizaÂ¬
tion.
I have recently returned from the
Regional I meeting of your organization
and wish to waste no time in applying
for membership.
Thank you for your consideration.
Sincerely yours.
Michael J. Ambrosino
Television Coordinator
MJA/td
